mapper.select: SELECT fs.formula_id AS id, f.`name` AS formulaName, fs.sensor_id AS sensorId, fs.device_id AS deviceId, fs.min_x AS minX, fs.max_x AS maxX, fs.x_range_type AS xRangeType, fs.min_y AS minY, fs.max_y AS maxY, fs.y_range_type AS yRangeType, fs.sign_type AS signType, f.paramCount AS paramCount FROM m_formula_sensor fs INNER JOIN m_formula f ON f.id = fs.`formula_id` WHERE fs.device_id = #{deviceId} AND fs.sensor_id = #{sensorId}

SELECT fs.formula_id AS id, fs.sensor_id AS sensorId, fs.device_id AS deviceId, fs.min_x AS minX, fs.max_x AS maxX, fs.x_range_type AS xRangeType, fs.min_y AS minY, fs.max_y AS maxY, fs.y_range_type AS yRangeType, fs.sign_type AS signType, f.paramCount AS paramCount FROM m_formula_sensor fs INNER JOIN m_formula f ON f.id = fs.`formula_id` WHERE fs.device_id = #{deviceId}
SELECT fp.sensor_id AS sensorId, fp.`name` AS `name`, fp.`value` AS `value` FROM m_formula_param fp WHERE fp.device_id = #{deviceId} ORDER BY fp.sensor_id, fp.`name` ;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM m_formula_param WHERE device_id = #{deviceId} AND sensor_id = #{sensorId}
